item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, December 1, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:

29. Breaking the 4Chan CAPTCHA (547 points | 322 comments)
30. What does this button do? – My new car has a mysterious and undocumented switch (665 points | 480 comments)
